channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Post Grid, Post Carousel, & List Category Posts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Post Grid, Post Carousel, & List Category Posts

item.title: CVE-2023-0097|2024-08-02T05:02:43.373Z -- unknown -- post%20grid%2C%20post%20carousel%2C%20%26%20list%20category%20posts
item.description: The Post Grid, Post Carousel, & List Category Posts WordPress plugin before 2.4.19 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
